api-call-body.value: SELECT AppType, AppTypeDisplayName, ID, Name FROM Application where Name not in ('User Portal', 'User Behavioral Analytics Portal',                    'CyberArk Remote Access Portal', 'CyberArk OIDC Trust App',                   'Flows Portal', 'CyberArk Secure Web Sessions Portal',                  'CyberArk SWS & Secure Browser', 'CyberArk SWS & Secure Browser')

api-call-body.value: SELECT    Role.ID,    Role.Name FROM    Role WHERE   Role.ReadOnly = 'false'   and Role.IsHidden is null

userEmail.name: User Email

userId.description: The name of the user running the flow
userId.name: User Name
